name: After School Program and Summer Program
description: If you do not have anyone available to watch them during the afternoon, enroll your child in the APACC After School Program! Children grades 1-8 are eligible. Pick up is available for students attending Our Lady of Visitacion School. Family income will determine the fee per semester.
fullDescription: If you do not have anyone available to watch them during the afternoon, enroll your child in the APACC After School Program! Children grades 1-8 are eligible. Pick up is available for students attending Our Lady of Visitacion School. Family income will determine the fee per semester.
whatTheyOffer: If you do not have anyone available to watch them during the afternoon, enroll your child in the APACC After School Program! Children grades 1-8 are eligible. Pick up is available for students attending Our Lady of Visitacion School. Family income will determine the fee per semester.
howToGetIt: For questions or to apply for this program, please contact Program Managers Kelvin Chan or Kirstie Dutton at 415-587-2689 or info@apaccsf.org
cost: sliding scale call for more information
